title: 820-2494 problem efi beep at start
message:
Hi, 
i have a problem with this board, beep at start (not ram, efi problem).
i upload the file of the bios (U6100), i can't make a clean me because i can't find krid, is it normal?
thanks

title: 820-2494 problem efi beep at start
message:
This is Intel Core 2 Duo, no ME region, ME region only on intel core iX boards.....

What is the beep sequence???

title: 820-2494 problem efi beep at start
message:
like an SOS 3 short, 3 long and 3 short.
ok but it's a corrupted bios?

title: 820-2494 problem efi beep at start
message: Just a corrupted BIOS. You can safely take any BIOS and use it, no ME problems.
